<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Summoner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2957) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Summoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=96)

**Prerequisites**
[Summoner Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2953)

</column>

---

You gain the [basic bounded spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1485). You gain the Cast a Spell activity. Your key spellcasting ability for summoner archetype spells is Charisma, and they are summoner spells of your [eidolon's](/classes/summoner/eidolons) tradition. You become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs of that tradition. You gain a spell repertoire and two cantrips. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the summoner archetype, add a spell of that level or lower to your repertoire. Each time you lose spell slots of a particular level, remove those spells from your repertoire.

<title level="2">Basic Summoner Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Expert Summoner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2959)
name: Basic Summoner Spellcasting
